summary: The Block recently published a research report examining the The State of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Landscape,  examining the growth within this sector. In this webinar The Block's Head of Research, Larry Cermak, is joined by executives from leading data service and infrastructure providers to explore the findings of the report.
title: The Block Presents: The State of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Landscape
content: The Block recently published a research report examining the The State of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Landscape, examining the growth within this sector. The Block’s Director of Research, Larry Cermak, hosted a webinar with executives from leading data service and infrastructure providers to explore the findings of the report.
Larry Cermak was joined by Tim Rice, CEO of Coin Metrics, Mike Alfred, CEO of Digital Assets Data, and Adam Traidman, CEO of BRD.
In this webinar Larry and the panelists discuss:
You can view the entire webinar below, along with the related slides. You can also view and register for all of The Block’s upcoming webinars.
The full report is available to view and download here.
